title: A Film about film making
creator_contributor_role: International Film Bureau Inc, production company

description: An explanation about how a group of people make a film. From the idea, we see the process of choosing cast and crew, writing of the synopsis giving setting, characters of the story, clothes, props and action. The formation of a shooting script is seen, and planning of action. Finally the film is shot, edited and shown.
